The '''Rite of Parting''' is a ceremonial funeral held for deceased [[Adepti]] or [[Gods]]. This ceremony requires certain offerings and tools to be prepared, such as [[Glaze Lily]], [[Cleansing Bell]] and [[Everlasting Incense]]. An instance of a Rite of Parting is shown in the quest [[The Fond Farewell]], where it was held for [[Rex Lapis]].
